definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The store owner always jacks up his prices before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 这家店老板总在耶诞节前哄抬物价。

sentences.english: Company employees received a 25 Christmas bonus.
sentences.chinese: 公司雇员得到25英镑的耶诞节赠金。

sentences.english: The boy gorged on turkey on Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩耶诞节那天大吃火鸡。

sentences.english: Shops are very overcrowded before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 商店在耶诞节前非常拥挤。

sentences.english: The multi-cultural theme of Christmas has become a part of school education.
sentences.chinese: 耶诞节所代表的多元文化已成为学校教育的一部分。

sentences.english: Three christmases ago there was a power cut .
sentences.chinese: 三年前的耶诞节有过一次停电。

definition: Advent (Christian period of 4 weeks before Christmas)
Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡
All Saints' Day (Christian festival on 2nd November)
Assumption of the Virgin Mary (Christian festival on 15th August)
Lent (Christian period of forty days before Easter)
